titleStmt.title: Svvethland and Poland vvarres A souldiers returne out of Sweden, and his newes from the warres: or, Sweden and Poland vp in armes. And the entertainement of English souldiers there: with the fortunes and successe of those 1200. men that lately went thither.
titleStmt.author: Nixon, Anthony.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
